title: Rpgitem4.0.9后台疯狂报错+rpgitem4.0.9药水添加问题
author: SunnyDream
txt_content:
org.apache.commons.lang.UnhandledException: Plugin RPG_Items v4.09 generated an exception while executing task 58137
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:56)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
原因是: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Asynchronous entity add!
at org.spigotmc.AsyncCatcher.catchOp(AsyncCatcher.java:14)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.World.addEntity(World.java:991)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.World.addEntity(World.java:987)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.CraftWorld.dropItem(CraftWorld.java:313)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.CraftWorld.dropItemNaturally(CraftWorld.java:352)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.event.CraftEventFactory.callEntityDeathEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:385)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.EntityLiving.die(EntityLiving.java:874)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.EntityCreeper.die(EntityCreeper.java:137)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.EntityLiving.damageEntity(EntityLiving.java:812)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.EntityMonster.damageEntity(EntityMonster.java:42)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.Explosion.a(Explosion.java:131)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.World.createExplosion(World.java:1866)
at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.WorldServer.createExplosion(WorldServer.java:1020)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.CraftWorld.createExplosion(CraftWorld.java:545)
at yo.ci$1.run(PowerRumble.java:64)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:53)
... 3 more



顺便问问有时候rpgitem的药水添加不进去是格式错误但是我写的格式是绝对绝对正确的，求大佬能解答。

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content:
把服务器核心更新至PaperSpigot-1.8.8
https://mirror.tcotp.cn/#PaperSpigot

replies.author: SunnyDream
replies.txt_content:
Mucrazy 发表于 2019-2-14 14:38
把服务器核心更新至PaperSpigot-1.8.8
https://mirror.tcotp.cn/#PaperSpigot
哥 昨天用的核心就是照你这样的 然后可以 结果今天重启的时候又不行了 反而物品的描述也添加不了了

replies.txt_content:

哥 昨天用的核心就是照你这样的 然后可以 结果今天重启的时候又不行了 反而物品的描述也添加不了了 [:Str ...

replies.txt_content:

可是重置版有同意lore 和 同意附魔的功能吗

replies.txt_content:
